title: Commerce
description: The records related to buying and selling activity.

xdm:order.title: Order
xdm:order.description: The placed order for one or more products.

xdm:cartAbandons.description: A product list has been identified as no longer accessible or purchasable by the user.

xdm:checkouts.description: An action during a checkout process of a product list, there can be more than one checkout event if there are multiple steps in a checkout process. If there are multiple steps the event time information and referenced page or experience is used to identify the step individual events represent in order.

xdm:productListAdds.description: Addition of a product to the product list, for example a product is added to a shopping cart.

xdm:productListOpens.description: Initializations of a new product list, for example a shopping cart is created.

xdm:productListRemovals.description: Removal or removals of a product entry from a product list, for example a product is removed from a shopping cart.

xdm:productListReopens.title: Product List Reopens
xdm:productListReopens.description: A product list that was no longer accessible (abandoned) has been re-activated by the user. Example via a re-marketing activity.

xdm:productListViews.title: Product List Views
xdm:productListViews.description: View or views of a product-list has occurred.

xdm:productViews.title: Product Views
xdm:productViews.description: View or views of a product have occurred.

xdm:purchases.title: Purchases
xdm:purchases.description: An order has been accepted. Purchase is the only required action in a commerce conversion. Purchase must have a product list referenced.

xdm:saveForLaters.title: Save for Laters
xdm:saveForLaters.description: Product list is saved for future use, for example a product wish list.

xdm:inStorePurchase.title: In-store Purchase
xdm:inStorePurchase.description: 'inStore' purchase is saved for analytics use.

xdm:activationFee.title: Activation Fee
xdm:activationFee.description: Activation fee for an order, if applicable.

xdm:backorderAmount.title: Backorder Amount
xdm:backorderAmount.description: Tracks the total value of backordered items in a visitor's shopping cart.

xdm:productBrand.title: Product Brand
xdm:productBrand.description: Tracks the brand of an individual product.

xdm:cartID.title: Cart ID
xdm:cartID.description: If applicable, tracks a persistent cart identifier string that would expire upon a successful order event.

xdm:category.title: Category
xdm:category.description: Tracks the parent/main category of an individual product.

xdm:checkoutStart.title: Checkout Start
xdm:checkoutStart.description: The number of times a checkout was initiated.

xdm:checkoutComplete.title: Checkout Complete
xdm:checkoutComplete.description: The number of times a checkout was completed.

xdm:checkoutStep.title: Checkout Step
xdm:checkoutStep.description: Tracks the name of a single step in the checkout, if applicable.

xdm:checkoutType.title: Checkout Type
xdm:checkoutType.description: Different types of checkout types that could be used by the visitor, i.e. 'standard' or 'express'.

xdm:costOfGoodsSold.title: Cost of Goods Sold
xdm:costOfGoodsSold.description: Wholesale price of an item at the time the order is placed.  Typically only collected with server-side code.

xdm:crossSellProducts.title: Cross-Sell Products
xdm:crossSellProducts.description: Array of product SKUs/IDs displayed as related products.

xdm:deliveryFee.title: Delivery Fee
xdm:deliveryFee.description: Delivery fee for an order, if applicable.

xdm:depositAmount.title: Deposit Amount
xdm:depositAmount.description: Deposit amount applied to an order, if applicable.

xdm:discountAmount.title: Discount Amount
xdm:discountAmount.description: Total discount associated with the transaction.

xdm:inventoryCount.title: Inventory Count
xdm:inventoryCount.description: Tracks the current inventory count for an individual product.

xdm:itemsInProductList.title: Items in Product List
xdm:itemsInProductList.description: An array of all product SKUs/IDs in the list of products.  Used outside of a shopping cart.

xdm:itemTotalAmount.title: Order Item Total
xdm:itemTotalAmount.description: Revenue before discounts and coupons are added in. For better flexibility and total control over tracking, we let you decide how to calculate how coupons and discounts are applied.

xdm:oneClickPay.title: One Click Pay
xdm:oneClickPay.description: The number of times the visitor used the single click to pay method to checkout.

xdm:orderReview.title: Shopping Cart Order Review
xdm:orderReview.description: Counted when a customer views their order review screen before completing their order.

xdm:paymentMethodAdded.title: Payment Method Added
xdm:paymentMethodAdded.description: Captured if a visitor adds a payment method to their account.

xdm:productListPosition.title: Product List Position
xdm:productListPosition.description: Captures the position of the product item in a list of products.

xdm:productComparison.title: Product Comparison
xdm:productComparison.description: Counts if a given product was included in a comparison view.  Extension of comparison data type.

xdm:productDescription.title: Product Description
xdm:productDescription.description: Tracks the description of the individual product.

xdm:productImpression.title: Product Impression
xdm:productImpression.description: Counted any time a product thumbnail or summary view has been displayed, aside from the product detail page itself or as an item in a cart.

xdm:productListTotalItems.title: Product List Total Items
xdm:productListTotalItems.description: Count of total items currently in the shopping cart.

xdm:productListTotalValue.title: Product List Total Value
xdm:productListTotalValue.description: Count of total value of items currently in the shopping cart.

xdm:productRating.title: Product Rating
xdm:productRating.description: Tracks the rating of the individual product.

xdm:promoCodes.title: Promotional Codes
xdm:promoCodes.description: Captures any promotional code(s) that have successfully been applied during the checkout process.

xdm:quickView.title: Product Quick View
xdm:quickView.description: The number of times a product was selected for quick viewing in a modal or other scaled down product view.

xdm:productReviewRating.title: Product Review Rating
xdm:productReviewRating.description: Tracks the rating of a product review.

xdm:recurringCharge.title: Recurring Charge
xdm:recurringCharge.description: Portion of the order revenue that is due on a recurring basis.

xdm:revenueDue.title: Revenue Due
xdm:revenueDue.description: Portion of order revenue total due when the order is placed.

xdm:reorder.title: Reorder
xdm:reorder.description: Tracked when a visitor reorders from a list of previous orders.

xdm:productReviewComment.title: Product Review Comment
xdm:productReviewComment.description: Tracks the text content of a product review.

xdm:productReviewID.title: Product Review ID
xdm:productReviewID.description: Tracks the ID of a product review.

xdm:saveBillingInformation.title: Save Billing Information
xdm:saveBillingInformation.description: Tracks if a visitor chooses to have their billing information stored for future orders.

xdm:saveShippingInformation.title: Save Shipping Information
xdm:saveShippingInformation.description: Tracks if a visitor chooses to have their shipping information stored for future orders.

xdm:saveForLaterAdd.title: Add to Save for Later
xdm:saveForLaterAdd.description: Tracks when a visitor adds a product or item to their save for later list.

xdm:saveForLaterRemove.title: Remove from Save for Later
xdm:saveForLaterRemove.description: Tracks when a visitor views their save for later list.

xdm:saveForLaterView.title: View Save for Later
xdm:saveForLaterView.description: Tracks when a visitor removes a product or item to their save for later list.

xdm:shopBOPIS.title: Order Buy Online Ship to Store

xdm:shopBOSS.title: Order Buy Online Pickup in Store

xdm:shippingAmount.title: Order Shipping Amount
xdm:shippingAmount.description: Shipping cost associated with the transaction.

xdm:shippingMethod.title: Order Shipping Method
xdm:shippingMethod.description: Tracks the type of shipping selected for the order.

xdm:skuVariant.title: Product SKU Variant
xdm:skuVariant.description: Tracks if a product has alternate SKUs or IDs, such as different SKUs for color variants.

xdm:splitPaymentMethods.title: Split Payment Methods
xdm:splitPaymentMethods.description: Captured if a visitor chooses to use multiple payment methods (i.e. credit card & points) to complete a purchase.

xdm:storeId.title: Store ID
xdm:storeId.description: Store ID of BOPIS or BOSS store.

xdm:subcategory.title: Product Subcategory
xdm:subcategory.description: Tracks the child/sub category for the individual product.

xdm:subtotalAmount.title: Order Subtotal Amount
xdm:subtotalAmount.description: Tracks the total amount of the order before taxes and shippping amounts.

xdm:taxAmount.title: Order Tax Amount
xdm:taxAmount.description: Tracks the total amount of taxes applied to a successful order.

xdm:thumbnailUrl.title: Product Thumbnail URL
xdm:thumbnailUrl.description: Tracks the URL for the product thumbnail, when displayed.

xdm:tipAmount.title: Order Tip Amount
xdm:tipAmount.description: Total tip applied to an order, if applicable.
